short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove sponsored ads, Reels and short videos and any unwanted content from your Facebook feed. Hide or highlight posts with keywords

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Filter the Facebook feed from sponsored ads, unwanted posts (e.g. Reels and short videos, here are groups you might like) or any posts containing  keywords you choose. Alternatively, highlight them together with the posts containing your keywords. The detected keywords get highlighted and the posts containing them get outlined. 

The extension has a super simple user interface that is its icon. Click the icon to get rid of the ads in your Facebook feed. 

The settings are also to the point. Right click the icon and click Options in the context menu. In the options:
- Chose what to do with the detected ads and posts containing the keywords - hide or highlight. Highlighting allows appreciating the 100% accuracy of the extension.
- Enter the keywords that indicate the posts that you do not want to see or that you want to be highlighted.

You can choose to start the extension automatically each time you visit Facebook. The extension can always be stopped by clicking its icon.

How this extension is better than its analogues:
- It is 100% reliable
- It has minimal configuration: the field for your keywords and the two options Hide or Highlight. 
- It is free and open-source, feel free to reuse the source or suggest a new feature
